additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Each pack contains the juice of: Apple (63.9%)*, Sweet Potato (28.4%)*, Strawberry (2.9%)*, Purple Carrot (1.5%)*, Blackcurrant (1.2%)*, Lemon (1%)*, Raspberry (1%)*, Food Acid (Malic Acid, Citric Acid), Vitamin C, Natural Flavours. *Reconstituted Juice

additionalProperty.name: Dietary
additionalProperty.value: No Preservatives, Source of Vitamin C, No Added Sugars, No Artificial Flavours or Colours

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Do not purchase if pack is open or torn.

description: V8 Juice Apple Berry with apple, strawberry and purple carrot contains 1 serve of fruit and 1 serve of veg per 250mL.
name: V8 Apple Berry Fusion Juice Multipack 250mL
